title: Donut 15 with DIR harness, built in mono adapter, weight pocket, tank belts & BP

photos.alt: Skrzydło Donut 15 z wbudowanym adapterem, uprzężą DIR i zestawem kieszeni - TecLine
Donut 15 with DIR harness, built in mono adapter, weight pocket, tank belts & BP

description:
Product description

TECLINE DONUT 15 SET WITH BACKPLATE, DIR HARNESS AND WEIGHT POCKETS

 

DESCRIPTION:

- Double layer wing of 15L capacity (35lb/147N)

- Oval shape makes it easy to operate in any position, allowing free airflow

- Strong and soft outer shell made of special, dirt-repellent Heavy Duty 1000D Nylon - resistant to mechanical damages

- Inner bladder made of Nylon 840 with increased resistance to aging and cracking

- High quality 40 cm long inflator and 55 cm Proflex IFLP hose

- The inflator is led out on the left side of the wing so that it does not interfere with the cylinder, the inflator's elbow is reinforced with a wide band loop

- Wing equipped with one low-profile valve with a small, clearly visible red ball and special holes to facilitate gas dumping

- Harness with fixed or movable D-rings

 

SET COMPONENTS:

- Tecline Donut 15 Wing

- DIR harness with 3 mm sainless steel backplate

- 2 tank bands

- Weight pockets set
